note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices. Depending on the country and year, the mean relates to income (measured after taxes and benefits) or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Mean income or consumption per day vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.

display.name: Mean income or consumption per day
